settings.text: Share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, make announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

settings.title: Shopify site design and builds
settings.text: We create tailored e-commerce solutions that align with your brand and business goals. From designing an intuitive, responsive storefront to implementing the necessary integrations and features, we ensure a seamless user experience that drives sales and customer engagement on Shopify’s platform.

settings.title: Shopify 2.0 theme upgrades
settings.text: We offer Shopify 2.0 theme upgrades, helping businesses take advantage of Shopify’s latest features with improved performance, enhanced customisation options, and seamless integration of dynamic content to create a more flexible and modern online store.

settings.title: Store migration to Shopify
settings.text: We specialise in store migration to Shopify, ensuring a smooth transfer of your products, customer data, and content from other platforms to Shopify, while maintaining the integrity of your site and optimizing it for enhanced functionality and performance on the Shopify platform.

settings.title: Shopify redesigns and theme customisation
settings.text: We offer expert Shopify redesigns and theme customization services that transform your online store into a more visually engaging and user-friendly experience, tailored to your brand. With a focus on improving user experience and optimizing functionality, we can help increase customer retention and boost sales, making your Shopify store more effective in driving conversions.

settings.title: Shopify website management and support
settings.text: We can provide reliable Shopify website management and support services, handling everything from regular updates and troubleshooting to performance optimization and security, ensuring your online store runs smoothly and efficiently so you can focus on growing your business without worrying about the technical details.

settings.title: Shopify website audits
settings.text: We can offer detailed Shopify website audits to assess your store’s performance, user experience, SEO, and overall functionality, providing actionable insights and recommendations to optimize your site for better conversions, faster load times, and improved customer satisfaction.

Email marketing is a vital strategy for driving engagement and sales, and I specialize in using Klaviyo alongside Shopify to enhance its effectiveness. By integrating Klaviyo with your Shopify store, I enable real-time customer data synchronization, allowing for precise audience segmentation and targeted automated workflows. This approach helps to personalize customer interactions—whether through welcome emails or cart abandonment reminders—ultimately boosting conversion rates. With Klaviyo’s powerful analytics, I continuously optimize campaigns for maximum return on investment, ensuring that your email marketing not only reaches your audience but resonates with them effectively.

settings.title: Initial set up and Shopify integration
settings.text: I provide Shopify integration and initial setup of email marketing on Klaviyo, ensuring seamless synchronization between your store and Klaviyo

settings.title: Template creation
settings.text: Pair text with an image to focus on your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.

settings.title: Campaign management
settings.text: I specialize in campaign management for email marketing on Klaviyo, leveraging its powerful analytics and automation tools to create, execute, and optimize targeted email campaigns that drive engagement, boost customer loyalty, and increase conversions, while ensuring that your messaging aligns with your brand’s voice and goals.

"We very much see Times 2 as stakeholders in our business as they’ve always gone above and beyond to make sure we get rockstar service and a solution that bottom line makes us money and gives our customers the easiest possible online ordering experience. We’ve just re-platformed our website to Shopify this summer and the numbers don’t lie! Increased traffic, revenue and and customer satisfaction have all shot through the roof. We need have a future proof website delivered on budget, on time with some really complex backend requirements, Times 2 are very much at the heart of our business.”

"Times 2 have been nothing but amazing from our very first meeting... they have taken my ideas/sketches/dreams and made them a reality! I spent months going back and forth with other avenues to no avail. I knew what I wanted to do but I didn’t know how or if it was even going to be possible. Not only did they create a website that looks fantastic but is super easy to use for both the customer and for myself and my staff. I am not the most technically able so they showed me how to navigate the website with ease whilst always at the other end of the phone should anything need explaining for the second or even third time. I cannot thank them enough, not only do I now have a website to be proud of but I have the increase in revenue to go with it.”
